DOC.brief_title: Intradermal Vaccination With Stabilized Tumor mRNA - Clinical Phase I/II Trial Melanoma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: vaccination protocol induce specific immune response melanoma associate antigen intradermal injection mRNA cod correspond antigen . Antigens use Melan-A , Mage-A1 , Mage-A3 , Survivin , GP100 Tyrosinase . GM-CSF use adjuvans . Phase I/II clinical trial analyse safety immune respones stage III/IV melanoma patient .
DOC.criteria: stage III/IV fresh frozen tumortissue age 1875 informed consent give Karnofsky > = 70 % systemic glucocorticoid brain metestasis malignancy
